item.description: Biography I am a PhD student at the chair of Statistical Learning and Data Science at the LMU Munich since 2018. Moreover, I work as a research assistant at the Professorship of Methods of Empirical Educational Research at the University of Regensburg.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Machine learning for the educational sciences - Hilbert S, Coors S, Kraus E et al. (2021). Review of Education 9, e3310. Automatic Componentwise Boosting: An Interpretable AutoML System - Coors S, Schalk D, Bischl B, Rügamer D (2021). ECML-PKDD Workshop on Automating Data Science. Hyperparameter Optimization: Foundations, Algorithms, Best Practices and Open Challenges - Bischl B, Binder M, Lang M et al. (2021). arXiv preprint arXiv:2107.05847. Multi-Objective Automatic Machine Learning with AutoxgboostMC - Pfisterer F, Coors S, Thomas J, Bischl B (2019).
